name: HKDevice
desc: A device that generates data for HealthKit.

items.name: init(name: String?, manufacturer: String?, model: String?, hardwareVersion: String?, firmwareVersion: String?, softwareVersion: String?, localIdentifier: String?, udiDeviceIdentifier: String?)
class func local() -> HKDevice
items.desc: returns a device object that represents the current device.

items.name: var udiDeviceIdentifier: String?
items.desc: The device identifier portion of the US Food and Drug Administration’s Unique Device Identifier (UDI).

items.name: var firmwareVersion: String?
items.desc: An arbitrary string representing the current version of the firmware running on the device.

items.name: var hardwareVersion: String?
items.desc: An arbitrary string representing the hardware version of the device.

items.name: var localIdentifier: String?
items.desc: An identifier that uniquely identifies the device object on the hardware running this code.

items.name: var manufacturer: String?
items.desc: A string representing the device’s manufacturer.

items.name: var model: String?
items.desc: A string representing the device’s model.

items.name: var name: String?
items.desc: The user-facing name for the device.

items.name: var softwareVersion: String?
items.desc: An arbitrary string representing the version of the software running on the device.
